
{{alias}}( x )
    Returns an unsigned 32-bit integer corresponding to the less significant 32
    bits of a double-precision floating-point number.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: integer
        Lower order word (unsigned 32-bit integer).

    Examples
    --------
    > var w = {{alias}}( 3.14e201 )
    2479577218

    See Also
    --------
